basic.description: Track the amplitude of the audio signal
basic.name: Amplitude Follower

basicOutputInfo.description: The peak tracked amplitude for the current processing block
basicOutputInfo.name: Amplitude

copyright: Code copyright 2006 Dan Stowell; method from SuperCollider.  Freely redistributable (BSD license)

basic.description: The 60dB convergence time for an increase in amplitude
basic.name: Attack time

basic.description: The 60dB convergence time for a decrease in amplitude
basic.name: Release time

basic.description: Study a short section of audio and estimate its tempo, assuming the tempo is constant
basic.name: Simple Fixed Tempo Estimator

basicOutputInfo.description: Possible tempo estimates, one per bin with the most likely in the first bin
basicOutputInfo.name: Tempo candidates

basicOutputInfo.description: Filtered autocorrelation of onset detection function
basicOutputInfo.name: Filtered Autocorrelation

copyright: Code copyright 2008 Queen Mary, University of London.  Freely redistributable (BSD license)

basic.description: Minimum beat-per-minute value which the tempo estimator is able to return
basic.name: Minimum estimated tempo

basic.description: Maximum beat-per-minute value which the tempo estimator is able to return
basic.name: Maximum estimated tempo

basic.description: Length of audio input, in seconds, which should be taken into account when estimating tempo.  There is no need to supply the plugin with any further input once this time has elapsed since the start of the audio.  The tempo estimator may use only the first part of this, up to eight times the slowest beat duration: increasing this value further than that is unlikely to improve results.
basic.name: Input duration to study

basic.description: Detect percussive note onsets by identifying broadband energy rises
basic.name: Simple Percussion Onset Detector

copyright: Code copyright 2006 Queen Mary, University of London, after Dan Barry et al 2005.  Freely redistributable (BSD license)

basic.description: Energy rise within a frequency bin necessary to count toward broadband total
basic.name: Energy rise threshold

basic.description: Sensitivity of peak detector applied to broadband detection function
basic.name: Sensitivity

basic.description: Return the power spectrum of a signal
basic.name: Simple Power Spectrum

basicOutputInfo.description: Power values of the frequency spectrum bins calculated from the input signal
basicOutputInfo.name: Power Spectrum

basic.description: Calculate the centroid frequency of the spectrum of the input signal
basic.name: Spectral Centroid

basicOutputInfo.description: Centroid of the log weighted frequency spectrum
basicOutputInfo.name: Log Frequency Centroid

basicOutputInfo.description: Centroid of the linear frequency spectrum
basicOutputInfo.name: Linear Frequency Centroid

basic.description: Detect and count zero crossing points
basic.name: Zero Crossings

basicOutputInfo.description: The number of zero crossing points per processing block
basicOutputInfo.name: Zero Crossing Counts

basicOutputInfo.description: The locations of zero crossing points
basicOutputInfo.name: Zero Crossings
